title: Un Kangal Kannaadi Lyrics Krishnaveni Panjalai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Raman Mahadevan, Shreya Ghoshal,
Renina Reddy
Movie: Krishnaveni Panjalai
Lyrics: Thamarai

Un kangal kannaadi nirkindren munnaadi
En binbam ennodu pesiyadhe
En kannil uloadi nee vandha pinnadi
Soppanam ovvondrum koosiyadhe

Thooram yaar koduththaar
Athai kuraiththaal yaar thadupaar?
Kaathal koor nagaththaal
Oru kaayam naervathai paar..

Azhaiyaadha virunthaali
Mazhaiyae mazhaiyae
Atharkaaga idai vanthu
Nuzhainthaal pizhaiye
Ithu poal oru naal
Ini vaaithidumo..?  (un kangal...)

Kanvizhithu kanvizhithu karugudhe
Imai urakkaththai varachcholli urugudhe
Kannadiththu kannadiththu sirikudhe
Sila ragasiya kanavugal muraikudhe..

Pookalin vaasam ellam
En mookidam thoarkiradhe
Nee varum paathaiyilthaan
En kaal kondu serkiradhe
Un koonthal ini iravaagum,
En kaigal athai pagalaakum

Un muththam miga uvarppakum..
En vetkam vanthu inippaakum
Kadal melae aadum padakile..
Karai šaera paarthu udayudhe.. (un kangal..)

Ethanai naal ippadiye irupathu
Indha boomiyai pol mudivindri poruppadhu
Karpooramaai ilamayum karaiyuthu
Oru kambiyillah kaaval-illah sirai idhu

Thoodhaai poi varuma
Pon megam paesiduma ?
Eeram un viralaai
En melae elludhiduma

Pesaamal unnai paarkaamal
Oru naalum manam thaangaadhe
Thaangaamal vizhi neer sindhi
Thozhmeedhu vandhu saaivene

Indha vaanam megam vazhthudho!!
Verum aasai kaati veelthudo!!  (Un kangal...)
Thooram yaar koduththaar
Athai kuraiththaal yaar thadupaar?
Kaathal koor nagaththaal
Oru kaayam naervathai paar..

Azhaiyaadha virundhaali
mazhaiyae mazhaiyae
Atharkaaga idai vanthu
nuzhainthaal pizhaiye
Ithu poal oru naal
ini vaaithidumo..?  (Un kangal...)

seo.description: Get the complete Un Kangal Kannaadi Lyrics Krishnaveni Panjalai Songs Lyrics from Krishnaveni Panjalai. Read the lyrics penned by Thamarai and composed by N. R. Raghunanthan and sung by Raman Mahadevan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Thamarai, Krishnaveni Panjalai, N. R. Raghunanthan, Raman Mahadevan, Shreya Goshal, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
